name: Minipong's Game
description:
Hi there!

My name is Josh, or Minipong, and for the last 8 years of my life I've been learning how to program. At home and at school, day and night, whenever I get a chance!

Recently, I decided to put my abilities to the test with a project I've so far called simply the Minipong Game. While this name is subject to change, and so is a majority of what you can see so far. If you'd like to learn more about the game or connect with us, feel free to join the discord server!
